name: ECHOES OF HUMANITY
description:
In this short existential horror game developed for the SCREAMSONIC game jam, you become a historian tasked with investigating what happened to Earth. Aiding you is a radio capable of listening to ULDEs (Ultra Long Delayed Echoes).

These are broadcasts from the past; these are the Echoes of Humanity.

GAMEPLAY TIP
  • Press the Left/Right arrows or A/D keys to move the dial
    • Move the dial in such a way that the radio makes the highest pitch
  • Hold Escape to close the game (START on controller)
DISCLAIMER

This game is a work of fiction depicting an opinionated version of the future and our present day.
